name: Mercenaries (itch)
description:
In this game the goal is to survive as long as you can by fighting off explosives-wielding enemies. As you fight to survive, the whole environment is destructible which means a once perfect building may descend into rubble by the end of the game!

Good luck, and try to survive as long as you can!

All assets for this game were created in 72hours as well as the code for the Score Space Jam #5!
